title: Types of bonding in 3 substances from properties

content.question: Three substances were studied in the laboratory, and the data in the table above were collected. Based on the data, which of the following shows the type of bonding in each substance?

choices.label: Substance X ​​​​​​​Substance Y Substance Z Network covalent Ionic Metallic
Substance X Substance Y Substance Z Ionic Molecular Network covalent
Substance X Substance Y Substance Z Molecular Network covalent Metallic
Substance X Substance Y Substance Z Network covalent Metallic Ionic

content.answer: Substance X Substance Y Substance Z Network covalent Metallic Ionic

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from experimental data.
